description.prefix: Add-ons allow your group (incentive trips or retreats) to split into smaller groups to enjoy
description.suffix: tailored to the diverse interests and preferences of your team members.

diverse.title: Diverse Interests
diverse.description: Cater to different preferences within your team

flexible.title: Flexible Groups
flexible.description: Split into smaller, more manageable groups

customizable.title: Customizable
customizable.description: Tailored activities for every team member

contact.title: So, is your group ready to be part of a transformative experience in Colombia?

experience.title: Experience
experience.universitiesDescription: We have worked with the following universities:

temilola.name: Temilola R
temilola.review: I was amazed by how well-run it was. we were all put into groups with designated leaders who shared information every day. All things were taken care of and they were so thoughtful in providing little gifts from fun to functional along the way like shot glasses, sunscreen, medication for sickness on boats, coffee to take home. All the parties were so much fun and everyone was flexible and available to answer any questions. I highly recommend this team.

rebecca.name: Rebecca H
rebecca.review: I was amazed by how well-run it was. we were all put into groups with designated leaders who shared information every day. All things were taken care of and they were so thoughtful in providing little gifts from fun to functional along the way like shot glasses, sunscreen, medication for sickness on boats, coffee to take home. All the parties were so much fun and everyone was flexible and available to answer any questions. I highly recommend this team.

camila.name: Camila V
camila.review: This trip met and surpassed every expectation we had. What an incredible and unforgettable trip! Flawlessly organized, everything ran smoothly and every experience was magical.

recognition.title: Recognition
recognition.description: Thanks to our impact through Wonder groups and regenerative tourism in Colombia, we have obtained the following certifications:

groupsTypes.description: Bringing together groups of 30+ people for shared adventures and lasting memories.

universityGroups.title: University Groups:
universityGroups.description: Personalized group travel across Colombia, empowering master's students with immersive journeys that inspire, connect, and transform, tailored for future leaders.

hero.title: The greatest stories are those shared with friends and colleagues.

proposal.title: But to achieve this, we first ensure:

customerService.title: Exceptional Customer Service
customerService.description: Highly trained, knowledgeable staff providing exceptional care, worry-free planning, and personalized attention.

authentic.title: Authentic and Local Experiences
authentic.description: Genuine encounters with locals in "add-ons" and trip extensions to off-the-beaten-path destinations.

safety.title: Risk Management: Safety First!
safety.description: Expert risk management across ten key areas-from planning to execution-ensures your safety in both wilderness and urban tourism.

aboutUs.description: After exploring every corner of Colombia and traveling the world, we realized we needed to make things happen. That's how Wonder was born,

purpose.middle: and revealing the true potential of our country with

aboutUs.subtitle: We are dedicated to creating trips that transcend conventional tourism
aboutUs.impact: We see tourism as a tool for social development and are passionate about working with local communities in large cities and emerging destinations.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.subtitle: The impact behind our value proposition
impact.text: With over 80% of our clients from the US and Europe, we've welcomed 7,000+ travelers and created meaningful experiences across 25+ destinations throughout Colombia, from the vibrant streets of Cartagena to the coffee mountains and beyond.
